backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control, storage mixins, and CRUD operations for authenticated principals.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific frontend dropdown update to impacted files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose in the app architecture.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Guide detailing prerequisites and steps to deploy PlayPal to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry configuring meta tags, PWA manifest, iOS settings, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, orientation, and icon assets.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache versioning, precaching, cleanup, and network-first fetching.
frontend/scripts/mainnet-redeploy.sh: Bash script automating clean install, build, and mainnet deployment via dfx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile gating, and rendering the main app shell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: App layout with bottom navigation and three-screen routing: Discover, Profile, and Settings.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessageBubbl: Empty placeholder file for a chat message bubble component.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverCard.tsx: Displays a user profile card with photo, basic info, stats, and badges for position, zone, and availability.
Provides category and zone filter controls for discovering profiles using select inputs.
frontend/src/components/LevelStars.tsx: Renders up to five stars based on a user level converted to a numeric score.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoUplo: Handles photo uploads with validation, progress tracking, and integration with the backend upload mutation.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user photo if available or a fallback icon with gradient background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for profile operations, photo uploads, and discovering candidate profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and base styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with query and identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoverScreen.tsx: Implements the swipe-style discovery screen with filters, candidate navigation, and simple like/pass handling.
frontend/src/screens/EditProfileScreen.t: Form screen for editing the user's profile and submitting updates to the backend.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with branding, tagline, and login/create-account buttons.
frontend/src/screens/MatchesScreen.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a future matches screen.
Empty placeholder file for a future match profile screen.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Displays the user's profile with stats, bio, availability, and an option to edit or upload a photo.
Form for creating a new profile with fields for personal info, level, position, zone, and availability.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings page supporting logout and displaying basic app information.
frontend/src/utils/discoverFilterMapping: Exports category options used by the Discover filter UI.
frontend/src/utils/profileMappings.ts: Provides helpers for converting levels and positions to numbers or Spanish labels.
frontend/src/utils/startupPerf.ts: Empty utility file reserved for future startup performance logic.
frontend/src/utils/unreadMessagesStore.t: Empty file intended for future unread messages state management.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/uruguayDepartments.ts: Exports the full list of Uruguay departments and a constant for selecting all departments.
frontend/src/utils/zoneFilterMappings.ts: Empty placeholder for zone filter mapping utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking issues, feature requests, and scrollability requirements for the departments dropdown.
